name: AlarmSoundsForRoutines
0:
”Alexa, open Alarm Sounds Routine”
”Alexa, start Alarm Sounds Routine”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alarm sounds routine
des:
This is a simple alarm sounds Alexa Skill that's good for use in Alexa Routines. After being invoked, it immediately plays a random alarm sound without Alexa saying anything or asking you any question which means you don't have to be near the Alexa-enabled device when the routine begins.

More sound effects will be added incrementally in the future.

DISCLAIMER: The alarm sound effects used in this skill are not replacement for your actual security alarm system.

For sample usage, you could set it up so that if your Alexa-compatible security camera detects motion during sleep time at night, Alexa would play an alarm sound effect via this "Alarm Sounds For Routines" Alexa skill.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this "Alarm Sounds For Routines" Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select "Alarm Sounds For Routines".
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.

Sound effects License: The sound effects used are under Public Domain.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
